intro: Dracontomelon macrocarpum, commonly known as the large-fruited dracontomelon, is a species of flowering plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is native to Southeast Asia and is characterized by its evergreen foliage and showy, clustered flowers. Due to its ornamental value and ecological importance, it is sometimes cultivated in botanical gardens and conservation areas.
